subject: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND PLC (RBS)
Head Office Address: Junghofstraße 22, 60311,
Frankfurt Am Main, Germany
Phone: +49 69 26906 523
Fax: +49 69 26906 444
E-Mail: royalbank1833@gmail.com


Kind Attn  Sanjuana

We are writing to inform you that your response to this bank has been
received.
And the content there was carefully read and understood. However, prior to
your letter, we had already received instructions from the United Nations
and the European Union (EU) to approve the payment of your funds through an
international ATM card, which you can easily take to your bank in your
country for gradual withdrawals.

For further proceedings, you are advised to provide us with the following
information.

(1) Your full name
(2) Your current contact address to which the courier will deliver the
originals of your documents.
(3) Name of your country
(4) Mobile/telephone numbers
(5) Name of the nearest International Airport to your city.

Once the above details are confirmed, the processing department of this
bank will process your payment approval document and send it to you for
your record.

We are waiting for your answer.

Mrs. Angela Reilly
Managing Director (RBS) Germany

subject: Re: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
Hello Mrs. Angela Reilly,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval of my funds through an ATM card. I appreciate your prompt response and would like to proceed with the necessary steps.

Before I provide you with the requested information, could you please clarify how this process works? How will the ATM card be delivered to me, and what are the next steps after I receive it? Additionally, are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction that I should be aware of?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sanjuana

subject: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND PLC (RBS)
Head Office Address: Junghofstraße 22, 60311,
Frankfurt Am Main, Germany
Phone: +49 69 26906 523
Fax: +49 69 26906 444
E-Mail: royalbank18333@gmail.com <royalbank1833@gmail.com>


Kind Attn of  Sanjuana

We are writing to apologize for the slight delay, we were trying to put
everything together before responding to you.

Therefore, we would like to inform you that processing of your
international ATM card payment is ongoing and will be ready for dispatch by
next Monday. On this day, we will attach the payment approval document and
a copy of the ATM card for your convenience, and the original documents
will be delivered to you via GreenLand courier delivery service with a
TRACKING number for your follow-up.

However, we want to inform you that the funds beneficiary will be
responsible for the little  courier fees and insurance fees for security
reasons depending on the amount stated.

We are waiting for your answer.

Mrs. Angela Reilly
Managing Director (RBS) Germany

subject: Re: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
Hello Mrs. Angela Reilly,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the processing of my ATM card payment. I appreciate your efforts in putting everything together before responding to me. 

I understand that the processing is ongoing and the ATM card will be ready for dispatch by next Monday. It's great to hear that you will be attaching the payment approval document and a copy of the ATM card on that day. I look forward to receiving them.

Could you please provide more information about the courier delivery service? Which company will be handling the delivery, and do you have an estimated timeframe for when I can expect to receive the original documents?

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "the funds will be for the little courier fees and insurance fees"? How much would these fees amount to, and how should I proceed with making the payment?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Sanjuana

subject: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND PLC (RBS)
Head Office Address: Junghofstraße 22, 60311,
Frankfurt Am Main, Germany
Phone: +49 69 26906 523
Fax: +49 69 26906 444
E-Mail: royalbank18333@gmail.com <royalbank1833@gmail.com>


Kind Attn of  Sanjuana

This is to confirm the receipt of your message.  We are very sorry for
responding late to your message/questions, the reason is that we have a lot
of pending transactions on our table, and also trying to inquire from the
Courier company and Insurance company how much it will cost you to finalize
your transaction and make delivery of your Cards with all related approval
documents to your doorstep.

The insurance company charged the sum of €400.

While the Courier company charged the sum of €102.

The total of the  cost you will spend to have your funds via ATM card
delivered to you is €502 (Five Hundred and Two Euros. )

It's imperative you immediately reconfirm your contact details as stated in
one of our previous messages.

We are waiting for your answer.

Mrs. Angela Reilly
Managing Director (RBS) Germany

subject: Re: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the delivery of my cards and related approval documents. Could you please provide more details on how the total cost of Five Hundred and Two Euros is broken down between the insurance company and the courier company? Also, could you confirm the exact process for finalizing this delivery? Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Sanjuana

subject: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND PLC (RBS)
Head Office Address: Junghofstraße 22, 60311,
Frankfurt Am Main, Germany
Phone: +49 69 26906 523
Fax: +49 69 26906 444
E-Mail: royalbank1833@gmail.com


Kind Attn Sanjuana

This confirms the receipt of your message to us. Please note that
immediately your  international ATM card is successfully produced, it will
be submitted to the  Courier company for onward delivery to your doorstep.
It is important for you to know that all related approval documents to your
funds payment will be packaged together in the parcel, this also includes
the booklet/directive of the ATM Card.
Please note that there will be no more charges as soon as you pay the
delivery fee and your parcel insurance cover charges.
We believed with this little explanation, you can now reconfirm to us your
contact details as requested earlier so as to enable us finalize with the
approval tomorrow.

*The courier took (102 Euros).*

*While Insurance charges (400 Euros).*

*Total = 502 (Euros).*

Once payment for shipping and insurance has been confirmed, we will
officially register the package and send you courier TRACKING numbers for
your follow-up.

We are waiting for your answer.

Mrs. Angela Reilly
Managing Director (RBS) Germany

subject: Re: Kind Attn Sanjuana
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the process of receiving the ATM card? How can I ensure that the delivery will be secure and timely?

Best wishes,
Sanjuana
